<template>
  <main id="main-home"></main>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SweetProjects",
  components: {},
   data() {
    return {
      projects: [
        {
          index:1,
          name:"Side project managment App",
          image: null,
          categories:[],
        },
                {
          index:2,
          name:"Side project managment App",
          image: null,
          categories:[],
        },
                {
          index:3,
          name:"Side project managment App",
          image: null,
          categories:[],
        },
                {
          index:4,
          name:"Side project managment App",
          image: null,
          categories:[],
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  computed: {
    chunkedProjects() {
      return this.chunk(this.projects, 3);
    },
  },
  methods: {
    chunk(array, chunkSize) {
      let chunkedArray = [];
      for (let i = 0; i < array.length; i += chunkSize) {
        const chunk = array.slice(i, i + chunkSize);
        chunkedArray.push(chunk);
      }
      return chunkedArray;
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    console.log("SWEEt PROJECTS MOUNTED");
  },
};
</script>
